RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 71. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET SASSICAIA behind the pace inside, continued to track the leaders while saving ground turn, lodged a late bid inside the two leaders at the chute gap with a sixteenth remaining, proved best under firm handling. FLOWERS APRIORITY broke alertly, dueled up front closest to the inside, continued to alternate for the advantage through the turn and into the straight, held a slightly larger advantage with a furlong to run, could not contain the winner, held sway for the place while between horses at the wire. FIRE VISION away in good order, set or forced the pace in the two path and outside the runner up, weakened a bit late, comfortably saved the show. DRIFTING MELODIES within striking distance while outside the dueling leaders, lacked a closing punch in the drive. TDZ WHAT A DEAL broke back,moved up to race in mid pack off the inside, went one paced through the lane in also lacking a closing response. ROARING QUINN back off the pace outside, came four wide for the drive, failed to muster a rally as well. BLUE RIDGE ROMANCE void of speed, made little impact in remaining back. MY LITTLE MIA last to leave, was finished early. FUNKYLITTLESHACK broke through the gate prior to the start, broke back then checked up in some traffic, raced back, steadied, shuffled back rail turn, did not recover stretch following a rough trip.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Sassicaia
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind the pace inside, continued to trail, inside bid late, best

ENTRY.NAME: Tdz What a Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up mid pack and went one paced off rail

ENTRY.NAME: My Little Mia
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Funkylittleshack
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate, checked just after start, steadied turn

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Quinn
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 4w into the lane, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Flowers Apriority
ENTRY.OWNER: Jeansonne Justin Virgadamo Rodney and Bonura Keith
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front closest to rail, 2nd best btwn foes

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Ridge Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, made little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Fire Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: alternated up front 2p, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Drifting Melodies
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance outside, lacked winning bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 27, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 27, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27, 2023 Al lowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, if for $6,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight And Eligibility).

CLAIM.OWNER: Thompson Racing LLC (Stephen Thompson) and OM Racing Stable LLC

RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOTATAABEQ behind the pace along the inside for a half, steered out in some traffic to be three wide into the lane, roused, challenged outside the leader with less than a furlong remaining, floated out by that one late, proved best in a determined effort. JOLLY TOMMY pressed the issue early from the outside up the backstretch, challenged four wide into the turn, took over, clear a furlong out, drifted out when challenged late by the winner, relented, remained clear for the place. EYE DEE KAY broke back, continued to lack speed, four wide and between horses into the stretch, rallied for the show, no real threat to the top two. LOUIS LE GRANDE pressed the issue early, challenged between horses through the turn, gradually weakened through the stretch to lose a couple of positions. NORTHERNREFLECTION void of speed, five wide exiting the turn, went evenly the final furlong in lacking a closing response. COACH KENNY with the second flight up the backstretch off the inside, challenged three wide and between horses turn, faltered in the drive. BIG MONEY MACHINE cleared to the inside after an alertly start, showed the way up the backstretch and into the turn, vied along the rail through much of the bend then began to give way. EASY TO MISS remained back in lacking a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Motataabeq
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace inside, steered 3w into lane, floated out, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Easy to Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in lacked a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Northernreflection
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 5w into lane, evenly final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Louis Le Grande
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, bid between foes turn, weakened drive

ENTRY.NAME: Coach Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the 2nd flight, 3w bid btwn foes turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Big Money Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top,cleared to the inside,pace,vied turn rail, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Jolly Tommy
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell Heath Aaron and Campbell Sheena
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside, 4w bid into turn,took over, drifted out,relented

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Dee Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 4w into lane, rallied show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUZY DOLL'S READY broke out a bit to bother MYDEALOFTHEDAY, was righted and raced in the second flight early, asked along three wide then advanced on the leaders late in the turn, put a head in front past the furlong marker after drifting in a bit, found more late to hold the runner up safe in the waning strides. SERAPE back off the pace well out in the strip, was roused five wide turning for home, late bid, not enough at the wire, narrowly gained the place. AGGIE DOCTOR within striking distance off the inside, four wide exiting the turn inside the runner up, lodged a bid with less than a furlong remaining, also could not get to the winner, narrowly missed the show. MARDI GRAS ALARM lacked speed, improved position while racing toward the inside. MYDEALOFTHEDAY bothered at the start, trailed, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. SADIE'S RANSOM dueled up front while in the two path, began to give way when straightened for home. JANISTHEBEAUTY set or forced the pace for a half along the inside and also faltered through the stretch after helping set a quick opening quarter.

ENTRY.NAME: Mardi Gras Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, improved inside

ENTRY.NAME: Janisthebeauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, quick early, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Sadie's Ransom
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front off the inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Suzy Doll's Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out bit, 2nd flight, asked 3w turn, bid, drifted, held

ENTRY.NAME: Mydealoftheday
ENTRY.OWNER: Faulk Nathaniel J and Cormier Jr Clifton J
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, trailed, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Aggie Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, four wide into lane, bid, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Serape
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace outside, roused 5w into lane, late bid,just up 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARY JACK with the early pace outside, idled along when four wide into the stretch, continued to stall a furlong out, late push to be up in time. MISS CHARLIE GRAS pressed the issue for three furlongs off the inside, took over in upper stretch, held the advantage late, yielded late to the winner while inside that one. PEACEFUL VISION in mid pack early, advanced while being asked in the two path through the turn, lodged a bid between horses and inside the runner up inside the furlong grounds, hung, missed nod for the place. SASSY EMMA lacked speed out in the strip, came five wide for the drive, managed little in the way of any late gain. COUNTRY DREAM broke back, advanced five wide late in the turn, failed to sustain that advance the final furlong. CUSTOM GUITAR went one paced in mid pack throughout in lacking a closing response. TAILORBESWIFT showed the way along the inside, weakened when headed by the runner up in upper stretch. BEAUTIFUL ENDING off a step slow, void of speed for a half, picked off some tiring rivals while never a threat. BE A BANDIT remained back in failing to menace. BOURN began to fade before a half. YOUNMEHONEYBUNNY also staged a steady retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Ending
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, back, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Be a Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Bourn
ENTRY.COMMENT: began to fade before a half

ENTRY.NAME: Tailorbeswift
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed the way inside, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout in mid pack

ENTRY.NAME: Country Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 5w advance late turn, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Peaceful Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, asked along 2p turn, roused upper, bid btwn, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Charlie Gras
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed off the inside, took over, yielded late

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Emma
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 5w into lane, no late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Mary Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: with early pace 3w, idled 4w into lane, late push outside

ENTRY.NAME: Younmehoneybunny
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady retreat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 88. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 27, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEAUX SUGAR broke back, moved up to clear before a quarter, continued to show the way through the turn, extended that advantage into the lane, stayed comfortably clear to the wire under steady handling. HALF OURS N STORMY lacked speed off the inside, came four wide for the drive, rallied down the middle of the course to be up in time for the place, not a serious threat to the winner. TACTICAL PRIORITY within striking distance up the backstretch, asked for run three wide through the turn, lost some ground to the winner into the lane, outkicked late for the runner up position. BUCK DOLL TAYLOR back off the pace, continued back through the turn, in some traffic inside the furlong marker, shifted out a bit and improved position. LOVEU AND PROUDOFU broke on top, relinquished the early advantage, chased the winner into and through the turn, had little left the final furlong. PINCH ME A PENNY in mid pack for three furlongs, lacked a closing punch. SADIE'S LIGHT broke back and was never dangerous.

ENTRY.NAME: Geaux Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up inside, clear, maintained daylight

ENTRY.NAME: Pinch Me a Penny
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, lacked closing punch

ENTRY.NAME: Buck Doll Taylor
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, traffic 1/16, improved late

ENTRY.NAME: Tactical Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, asked 3w turn, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sadie's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Loveu and Proudofu
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, relinquished lead, chased, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Half Ours N Stormy
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w into lane, rallied midcourse, up 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEL MAR DRAMA bumped then steadied to be last away, moved up to midpack before a quarter while between horses, closer turn, challenged inside the winner along the rail with just less than a furlong remaining, edged clear under steady handling. ALEXAPLAYBORNTORUN vied up front off the inside, gained a larger advantage when straightened for home, allowed the winner the inside with a furlong to run and proved no match for that one late, lasted for the place. SWEET BAY lacked early foot, five wide exiting the turn, shifted out to be wider still with a furlong to run, finished up willingly while too late for the place. BIND ON EARTH back in mid pack while outside, five wide through the run, some advancement upper stretch, went flat late to lose the show. BETISON broke on top, raced within striking distance well out in the strip, four wide trip through the turn, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing kick. BITSY C C LIL GIRL lacked speed, fanned six wide out of the turn, improved a bit but lacked a serious closing response as well. ITSNOTMYJOB prompted the issue early, vied through the turn outside the runner up, faltered in the drive to the wire. STORM BREACH fell well back after the start to trail, continued to lag turn, picked off a few tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. SUMMERTIME BANDIT was never a threat. LAURIEANN bumped at the start, moved up to mid pack along with the winner, began to fade before a half. MADAME JANE flashed brief speed and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Summertime Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 5w into lane, shifted wider, willing,too late 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Del Mar Drama
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump, steadied start, moved up, closer turn, inside bid 1/8, clr

ENTRY.NAME: Laurieann
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Madame Jane
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Breach
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell well back, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Bitsy C C Lil Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 6w into lane, no closing bid

ENTRY.NAME: Alexaplayborntorun
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front off rail, larger lead, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Itsnotmyjob
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted early pace, vied turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Bind On Earth
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, 5w turn, went flat late

ENTRY.NAME: Betison
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4w turn, empty late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 32000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 27, 2 023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DASHYNS DREAM chased the dueling leaders past the wire the first time, remained closest to that pair the middle half, bid between rivals inside the furlong marker, held clear then held sway late under steady handling. ALLIACEOUS settled off the pace toward the inside, covered up in some traffic into the far turn, shifted out a bit for room when set down nearing midstretch, closed with some energy to be steadily getting to the winner late. I BEAR ARMS last away, four wide through the first turn, closer three wide into the stretch, mild bid, outkicked for the second spot while up for the show in the final strides. WORLD WAR dueled up front closest to the inside, garnered a larger advantage past the furlong marker, could not last. TRIPLE L'S CUTTER in the second flight, came up empty for the drive. EMPTY NET broke inward but on top, dueled up front in the two path, first to blink into the stretch. QUINN ELLA three wide trip, remained back in failing to muster a rally. SHEZ OUR ARCH trailed throughout in failing to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: World War
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front inside, larger lead, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Alliaceous
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, traffic 3/8, steered out bit, steady gain

ENTRY.NAME: Shez Our Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Dashyns Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased dueling leaders, bid between, took over, held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pope McLean, Marc McLean & Pope McLean Jr.

ENTRY.NAME: Triple L's Cutter
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, came up empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Quinn Ella
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to rally

ENTRY.NAME: I Bear Arms
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, 4w firist turn, outkicked late 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Empty Net
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled off the inside, first to blink

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME CAJUN broke on top and got to the inside, vied up the backstretch and into the turn, fell back off the leader into and through upper stretch, rebid past the furlong marker, dug in late to prevail in game fashion. ASTERN BANKER back off the early pace outside, moved to a prominent position four wide through the turn, challenged outside the winner nearing the furlong grounds, outkicked in the late going. CHIPEEE in mid pack up the backstretch, in some traffic into the turn, steered to the outside midway the bend, rallied to be up for the show. RED ON THE HEAD moved up vie up front while off the inside up the backstretch, gained a larger advantage late in the turn, responded when challenged with a furlong to run, weakened from between horses late, lost the show at the wire. HOLIDAY RUN back off the pace, in some traffic late in the turn, came up empty when clear the final furlong. WILDCATS'S MEOW remained back and was never dangerous. GOLDEN CONFUSION shuffled back along the rail a furlong in and did not threaten thereafter. MIDGE'S TIME tired while racing outside. WILD FIST last to leave, four wide out of the turn, remained back in failing to rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Confusion
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back along the rail 5/8, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Chipeee
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, traffic 3/8, steered out, rallied, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, traffic late turn, empty when cleare

ENTRY.NAME: Red On the Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up vie off rail, larger lead late turn, weakened btwn foes

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Fist
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, 4w 1/4, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Cajun
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, vied inside, fell back, rebid midstretch, game

ENTRY.NAME: Astern Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the early pace, 4w advance turn, bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcats's Meow
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back and was never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Midge's Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: tired while racing outside
